email.subject: NCIX's Rock Solid Sale Event - Kick start your graphics performance! Video cards starting from $11.99*!

Featured in-store & web deals and other limited quantity promotions for our weekly promotional events will be released every Wednesday evening (unless specified otherwise). Products may sell out before you receive this newsletter. Please check NCIX.com every Wednesday evening for the latest promotions and current availability of our promotions.

*Shipping deals are valid only to Canadian Provinces and exclude the Territories and some rural areas. Applies to in-stock items only.
